Security & Surveillance


Artificial intelligence has played a growing role in security and surveillance since the late 1900s, when basic motion detection and video analytics first appeared in CCTV systems. Over time, AI-powered facial recognition and behavior analysis have enabled more accurate identification and threat detection. Today, AI continues to transform the field being used in everyday life as well as mass surveillance. On our Information Page you can learn more about how AI is being used specifically regarding facial recognition software and biometric data. You will also learn how AI can have many positive impacts in the field, but also negative impacts alongside those.

Even though we do not indulge in the consequences of AI usage in Security & Surveillance too deeply, we hope the common person can understand just how imperative it is for society to be aware of these technologies and their implications.

You can learn more about the implications of AI in Security & Surveillance here on our Information Page, or go to our About Us page to learn more about the creators of these webpages on Security & Surveillance.
